Container.Name: everything-search
Container.Overview: Everything Search is a fast file search utility for Windows, now running in Docker with Wine and accessible via web interface. This container runs the Windows version using Wine and provides access via a secure web interface (noVNC). Features include selectable executable via EVERYTHING_BINARY environment variable, Everything HTTP Server, ETP Server, and Server components. Multi-arch support (amd64 and i386) with optimized architecture-specific images. Uses -noapp-data, -config, and -db command line options to separate binaries (/bin), config (/config), and database (/data).
